text: <!channel>: client wants to know if he can begin adding beers to the cms
will this get in the way of anybody today?
hey karen. there are a couple things a would like clarification on in the cms before adding beers is completely finished. do you think you, me and gaston could chat really quick this morning?
Yes -- let me know when it's a good time.
now or whenever is good with me
<@U02618EV1>: let us know when a good time presents itself.
Sure. Is this separate from the checkin later today?
yes this is me needing a couple answers to some questions so the beer pages in the cms can be wrapped up asap
Sure thing before 11 is probably better
now?
sure
okay
mt room we goo
<!channel>: forgot my question i had for you guys
client's asking if there's a preview/staging site he can view what he's entering?
<http://sbdev.uncorkedstudios.com|sbdev.uncorkedstudios.com> is wired up (mostly)
also could be worth noting that the cms has a bunch of beer data that is both fake and taken from their existing site
not sure if we want to delete it all and start fresh or not
let's leave it in there and we can clean up a little later.
unless it makes sense to delete now. otherwise im okay cleaning up later.
it could confuse the client when entering beers is the only thing
okay let's take them out
if you let me know which ones are fake i can go through and delete
The only concern I have about that is that we're using those entries to develop or front-end.
think we should leave them in, then.
oh right i didn’t think about that
One thing we could do is ask them to publish their entries. Once they're done, we can delete all the "draft."
entries.
yesterday i made it so publish and save are synonymous, so once something is saved in the CMS, its state is published. so no new content will have a state of draft.
this shouldn’t change anything for you gaston, but it might be of interest still
<!channel> what’s going on with this recurring event thing? it’s not trivial
It's also news to me.
they want to be able to create an event with a time and date and mark it as recurring weekly? but in the screenshot they sent there are options for it to recur in a different pattern
can we keep cms as is and have them re enter recurring events?
if it's not trivial let's please chat.
this is news to me as well.
as it stands, when they enter an event it will show up immediately on the front end until the event is over
and if it should reoccur, they can just re-add it, correct?

so they would have to enter separate events for each week, but if they enter them all at once they will all show up on the front end unless we filter what shows on the site to only show events a week out or less or something like that
yes they can just re-add it
but if they add, say, 5 weeks of pint glass thursdays all at once they will all show up unless we tell events a week or more in the future to be hidden
what is the non-trivial part
is they mark an event as recurring, the server will need to auto generate that event every week or month or whatever
okay
it’s not that bad but probably can’t be finished today
roughly how much time
what could we get done today
on events?
how do we side step the work on the server side to make events recurring
i’ll give it a shot in the next 30 mins or so and see how close i get
do they only want weekly?
they have recurring and non recurring events
right
sounds like recurring events in any sense is work on the server side we didn't plan for?
yeah but the more i think about it it might not be so bad
as far as recurring events though, do they only expect weekly?
do 30 minutes and let me know how it goes.
we’re set up to handle non-recurring already
if it's a hairy beast let's reach out to the client
do they only expect to be able to schedule things as weekly?
for recurring events
simple events
nothing crazy.
but weekly?
as opposed to giving them monthly, biweekly, etc. options as well?
is weekly the issue on the server
no
ok
but i need to know if they want MORE than weekly
ok
<@U02613K0X> all I will need from you is the recurring flag
what do you mean if they want more than weekly
bi-weekly?
if they want more options for recurring patterns than just weekly
<@U02618EV1> what do you need the recurring flag for?
i see
isee
I need to know if the event is recurring (yes/no) so I can update the "add to" calendar script
oo ok gotcha
i’m going to assume weekly right now
ok
lets assume weekly
from the looks of their site that’s all they do now
So does weekly = recurring?
the flag name or in general?
For the purposes of this site.
Hey <@U02613K0X> here are new beer sizes we need
Width 120px ( retina), width 60px (desktop @1x)
The height is dictated by the images' aspect ratio.
okay, so we need these versions of the beer glass assets to put up on s3
Yes, please.
are the assets i have the correct ones?
there seemed to be some confusion on that this morning i guess they’ve sent us a bunch?
Probably not.
I just got the correct ones so you probably don't have them.
<https://mafilexfer.mullen.com/message/KnEHAlez1lfPxP7YSDhmSY>
You can get them from this link.
okay and i just resize them?
i’m just going to use preview to resize them and save them to s3 unless there is a better way i should be doing it
Can we have the CMS resize them?
it’s not really set up for that but i could tweak it to be if you think that’s better?
Ohhh, I completely forgot we don't have the client add these.
yeah. we are adding them
Let me resize them for you. May take a while b/c of the Adobe thing not working for me.
it’s not too much trouble?
On the phone with Adobe again. Need their programs to make this thing.
A file was shared
<!channel> Are we doing our meeting?

[smallbatch-frontend/] 3 new commits:
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/ded2478d65ef62ffd0519bc37ecdf8385a380a97|ded2478d65ef>: Wired up desktop footer social media.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/78bca890e6a76c3ba4c146887bf533f9783aeaf2|78bca890e6a7>: Add beer img to home and add initial share this functionality.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/7b23d5507f4ffbf1e9eb0040a03e5ad76267a419|7b23d5507f4f>: Small adjustments and added footer bg on philosophy.
 - Gaston Figueroa
